statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_forecast WHERE date = '2022-05-01' AND sold_quantity > 10
SELECT product_id, SUM(sold_quantity) AS total_sold FROM inventory_forecast GROUP BY product_id
SELECT date, unit_price FROM inventory_forecast WHERE product_id = 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT product_id, unit_price FROM inventory_forecast WHERE sold_quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM inventory_forecast
SELECT * FROM inventory_forecast WHERE product_id = 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_id, SUM(sold_quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM inventory_forecast WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity_sold > 1000
SELECT product_id, AVG(unit_price) AS average_price FROM inventory_forecast GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY average_price DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory_forecast WHERE unit_price > 50 AND sold_quantity < 50
SELECT DISTINCT product_id, date FROM inventory_forecast WHERE date >= '2022-06-01'
SELECT * FROM inventory_sales WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, sales_quantity FROM inventory_sales WHERE sales_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM inventory_forecast WHERE forecast_quantity > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, sales_quantity FROM inventory_sales ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, forecast_quantity FROM inventory_forecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM inventory_sales WHERE sales_quantity > 100 ORDER BY sales_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, sales_quantity FROM inventory_sales WHERE sales_quantity > 50 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, sales_date, forecast_quantity FROM inventory_sales AS s INNER JOIN inventory_forecast AS f ON s.product_id = f.product_id WHERE s.sales_quantity = f.forecast_quantity;
SELECT product_name, forecast_date, forecast_quantity FROM inventory_forecast ORDER BY forecast_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, sales_date, sales_quantity FROM inventory_sales WHERE sales_quantity > 200 ORDER BY sales_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, stock_level FROM inventory_data ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT MAX(sale_amount) AS max_sale_amount FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_id, forecast_date, forecasted_amount FROM forecasting_data WHERE forecasted_amount > 1000 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2021-01-01' AND sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT s.product_id, s.sale_date, s.sale_amount, i.stock_level FROM sales_data s INNER JOIN inventory_data i ON s.product_id = i.product_id ORDER BY s.sale_date ASC, i.stock_level DESC

SELECT f.product_id, f.forecast_date, f.forecasted_amount, i.stock_level FROM forecasting_data f LEFT JOIN inventory_data i ON f.product_id = i.product_id WHERE i.stock_level < 50 ORDER BY f.forecast_date ASC

SELECT s.transaction_id, s.sale_amount, i.stock_level, f.forecasted_amount FROM sales_data s JOIN inventory_data i JOIN forecasting_data f ON s.product_id = i.product_id AND s.product_id = f.product_id WHERE s.sale_amount > 2000 AND f.forecasted_amount < 500 ORDER BY s.sale_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount < 500
SELECT product_name, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 2000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date, sale_id FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_data WHERE available_quantity > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT forecast_date, product_name, predicted_quantity FROM forecast_data WHERE predicted_quantity >= 500;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM historical_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM inventory_forecast
SELECT product_id, forecasted_quantity FROM inventory_forecast WHERE date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_id, date, forecasted_quantity FROM inventory_forecast ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inventory_forecast WHERE forecasted_quantity > 100
SELECT AVG(forecasted_quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM inventory_forecast
SELECT * FROM inventory_forecast WHERE product_id = 123 AND date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, SUM(forecasted_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_forecast GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;

SELECT product_id, AVG(forecasted_quantity) AS avg_quantity, MIN(forecasted_quantity) AS min_quantity, MAX(forecasted_quantity) AS max_quantity FROM inventory_forecast WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY product_id HAVING max_quantity > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM inventory_forecast ORDER BY product_id ASC, date DESC;
SELECT product_id, forecasted_quantity FROM inventory_forecast WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM inventory_forecast WHERE date = '2022-03-15') ORDER BY forecasted_quantity DESC;
